verses.name: Romans 6:10
verses.text: For in that he died, he died unto sin once: but in that he liveth, he liveth unto God.

verses.name: Romans 6:11
verses.text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin, but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord.

verses.name: Romans 6:12
verses.text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof.

verses.name: Romans 6:13
verses.text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin: but yield yourselves unto God, as those that are alive from the dead, and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God.
